name: plant vs black ops
description:
at first if there is something wrong with my game please tell me

Mixed game among my favorite series of games call of duty black ops and plant vs zombie

I literally made this game in 5 days You must protect the house from the sweeping zombie attack in cooperation with the powerful plants  And with weapons, you should think before spending your souls, because they only come again when killing zombies

I'm thinking of adding a random box of weapons what do you think؟؟؟؟
